tool_input.command:
git commit -m "$(cat <<'EOF'
ðŸ“� docs: add personal author notes feature to commit command

Enhanced the commit command documentation to include --notes option for personal author comments. This allows developers to add contextual notes that help remember the reasoning behind each commit.

Author Notes: testing if the authors notes section work

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.ai/code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)"
